revised_title: Eccentric Oblate Bodies and Disks as Projectiles: A Study on Improved Gun Design
tldr: The author conducted experiments with eccentric oblate bodies and disks as projectiles to improve gun design. They found that by adjusting the center of gravity and using a disk with a zone of 60°, they could achieve a greater initial velocity and better sustained terminal velocity compared to spherical shot and rifle projectiles. The author also discussed the history of the eccentric principle and its applications in warfare.
